WorkItem.Description:
If you visit this URL: http://www.nerddinner.com/Services/OData.svc/Dinners(7)?$format=json
you'll find that the produced JSON is not valid, since the apostrophe (') in "Hey, you\'re in Vegas, why not eat at Chipotle!" is incorrectly "escaped".

This may not be a nerddinner related thing, but I couldn't figure out where this happens so I'm just reporting it as is.
